INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_AC_STK_TXN_DTL (AC_STK_TXN_DTL_ID, STK_TXN_ID, TXN_TYP_ID, TXN_TYP_ACTN_CDE, TXN_REF_NUM, CMPNY_CDE, INSTR_ID, INSTCL_ID, INSTCL_VID, MRKT_ID, VAL_DATE, INPT_DATE, MRKT_BUSDATE, STK_CHNL_CDE, REMRK, IS_AUTO_APRV, IS_MEMO, IS_TRNFR, IS_REV, IS_SHOW_IN_STMT, IS_TODAY_REV, REV_AC_STK_TXN_DTL_ID, IS_IGNR_DAT_SYNC, AC_ID, AVG_COST, AVG_COST_CCY_CDE, PRIMY_REMRK_FR_STMT, SYS_PRIMY_REMRK_FR_STMT, STMT_MODULE_CDE, STMT_MODULE_KEY, PRIMY_AC_STK_STMT_REMRK_ID, PRIMY_AC_STK_SYS_STMT_REMRK_ID, EXTRNL_TXN_REF_NUM, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ, IS_TP_TXN, IS_OTCR_TXN) VALUES (#{item.acStkTxnDtlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.stkTxnId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.txnTypId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.txnTypActnCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remrk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isAutoAprv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isTrnfr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isRev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isShowInStmt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isTodayRev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.revAcStkTxnDtlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isIgnrDatSync,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.acId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.extrnlTxnRefNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isTpTxn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isOtcrTxn,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
